xldoc.title: Quine on Carnap and Analyticity
xldoc.description: An analysis of Quine's writings bearing on Carnap, analyticity and related matteres.
xldoc.keywords: philosophy logic history Carnap Quine analytic truth convention
xldoc.maintitle: Quine on Carnap, the analytic/synthetic dichotomy and related matters, including truth by convention, modality and reference, semantics and ontology.

section.title: Overview
section.abstract: A survey and analysis of Quine's writings on Carnap's philosophy, the analytic/synthetic distinction and closely related issues.

sbcol.subsec: At this point we have here just a list of pertinent writings and links to such notes as I may have on them.

subsec.title: A logistical approach to the ontological problem (1939)
